item.title: Strawberry and Chocolate Desert
item.description: Difficulty: very easy Time: 5 minutes Ingredients (4 people): Skyr strawberry (450g) Mascarpone (200g) Ground almonds (50g) Strawberry (200g) Raspberries (100g) Dark chocolate (25g) Instructions: Mix the Skyr, ground almonds and mascarpone together. Serve in big bowls. Cut the strawberry in half and add on top of the mix with raspberries. Put the chocolate in a small bowl with water and put in the microwave for several seconds until the chocolate is melted.
